ideas.title: Construction Commute
ideas.premise: A single snail is seen wearing a hard hat and carrying blueprints, hopelessly stuck in traffic caused by the new infrastructure project.
ideas.why_funny: It highlights the ironic slowness of NYC construction despite ambitious plans.

ideas.title: Hot Dog Headline
ideas.premise: A street vendor in Times Square reads a newspaper with the headline: "Local Sports Team Wins! Sales Plummet as Fans Too Busy Celebrating."
ideas.why_funny: Juxtaposes victory with a relatable, localized economic impact.

ideas.title: The Weather Forecaster's Curse
ideas.premise: A weatherman on TV confidently forecasts 'Clear Skies!' as a rogue pigeon poops directly onto his head.
ideas.why_funny: Classic slapstick combined with the common New York pigeon problem.

ideas.title: Community Event Chaos
ideas.premise: A bird's-eye view of a community event in Central Park shows it turning into a chaotic free-for-all for free samples.
ideas.why_funny: Exaggerated portrayal of New Yorkers' eagerness for freebies.

ideas.title: Expansion Anxiety
ideas.premise: A small bodega owner nervously watches as a massive, shiny Starbucks opens directly across the street.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable fear of corporate competition for small businesses.
